title: The fund may also be used to support the cost of listing of heritage sites and cost towards expert guidance and fees for architects, engineers and other expert
clause_text: The fund may also be used to support the cost of listing of heritage sites and cost towards expert guidance and fees for architects, engineers and other expert.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
